paragraph_text:
Grease the bottom of a disposable pan with olive oil and place the pieces of mosht on it.
Olive oil is spread over the musht pieces for even lubrication and salt and black pepper are also sprinkled to taste.
Prepare the crust: grind parsley, garlic and walnuts in a food processor, coarse or fine, depending on personal taste. You can also manually chop the parsley, garlic and nuts to the desired texture.
Cover each stretched piece with a thin layer of crust, about 1/2 cm.

1 cup of mayonnaise
2 cans of tuna in oil, filtered
1/2 onion finely chopped
A spoonful of lemon juice
2 pickles - small cubes

paragraph_text:

To serve: grated parmesan cheese and a little fresh lemon juice

Teaspoon of salt
2 tablespoons of dry yeast
4 tablespoons of sugar
1/2 cup of oil
3 cups of lukewarm water
